extension.summary: Cliente InputStream para flujo de datos adaptativos
extension.description: Cliente InputStream para flujo de datos adaptativos
extension.news: [B]Version v2.6.0.2[/B] - Only show last tag's commits in changelog - update travis secure token - TravisCI integraton to build repo - Update Ubuntu version to 16.04 - Make build scripts take kodi version argument - Matrix build scripts - add build_scripts - remove debug flags - Don't stack subtitle if begin and end are equal - Revert "Correct Dolby Vision implementation (Matrix Only)" - Fix stream count - Fix Leia compatibilty in CDllHelper - Fix compile errors - add Matrix > Leia patch - Change Android search path for ssd_wv - Use CDllHelper for opening ssd_wv - Update README.md - Add parsing adaptionSet "name" parameter - inputstream.adaptive -> inputstream.adaptive.testing - Correct Dolby Vision implementation (Matrix Only) - Remove logging of unknown encryption methods - Fix up effective url - FreeSegments - operate on specific period - [HLS] EXT-X-DISCONTINUITY-SEQUENCE support - [HLS][Revert] share parameters between master / sub playlists - Fix url decoder - [WebVTT] Fix binary representation - [Android] only request and log (max)securitylevel and querykeystatus if - [TTML] Fix wrong applied m_ptsOffset on first sub - Fix url decoder - ctest implementation - [DASH] Adjust timing calculation - VUI: use framerate only if fixed_frame_rate_flag is set - Simplify processEncryption - allow new dolby schemeIdUri - Clang format - Add .clang-format - Check for representation duration if seek past last segment - [WEBVTT] Allow timespec without hours - [Android] Log DRM securityLevel after key request - Fix Netflix subs on seek / resume play - Fix segmented subtitles for live streams - [DASH] Fix youtube live subtitles - [DASH] Fix youtube live with multiple subs - Update Bento4 17e26f7 -> 158655e - Revert ReadGolomb/SignedGolomb to static - pass ssd in with AP4_CencSampleDecrypter::Create - Bento4: sample duration workaround (24/1) - Android 32 ftello - Hack HBO - Fix segfault when AP4_Sample's seek fails (double free) - Implement SPS Frame parser to get fps before first packet is send - [HLS + CODEC] Fixups - MP4: Implement MP4 DAC3 Atom (get correct channel count) - More HLS and cleanup - Fix VideoStreamChange by VUI Parser - SPS/VUI: swap fpsrate / scale - AACL: generate ESDS / AVC extract VUI values from SPS - more SPS parameters - Redo Backport of all smoothstream changes commit - Add additional methods/funtions and passing poolid - Update bento4 libs to 17e26f7, fix path issues
